//debug_mode: Turns debug mode on (1) / off (0). In debug mode the ticket won't be printed
//button_label_color: Hex code for the printing button's text color
//button_background_color: Hex code for the printing button's background color
//button_text_size: Size of the printing button's text
//button_border_radius: Radius of the printing button's corner (for a round corner effect)
//button_border_width: Width of the printing button's border in pixels
//button_border_style: Css style for the printing button's border
//button_border_color: Hex Code for the printing button's border color
//button_icon_filename: Name of the file for the printing button's logo
//button_icon_size_H: Height of the printing button's logo
//button_icon_size_W: Width of the printing button's logo
//ticket_store_name: Name of the store in the ticket
